algorithm.description: Gets or sets the content hash algorithm used to hash the content.

value.description: Gets or sets expected hash value of the content.

ContentHash.description: Definition of the runbook property type.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the runbook.

RunbookAssociationProperty.description: The runbook property associated with the entity.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the start time of the schedule.

startTimeOffsetMinutes.description: Gets the start time's offset in minutes.

expiryTime.description: Gets or sets the end time of the schedule.

expiryTimeOffsetMinutes.description: Gets or sets the expiry time's offset in minutes.

isEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this schedule is enabled.

nextRun.description: Gets or sets the next run time of the schedule.

nextRunOffsetMinutes.description: Gets or sets the next run time's offset in minutes.

interval.description: Gets or sets the interval of the schedule.

frequency.description: Gets or sets the frequency of the schedule.

timeZone.description: Gets or sets the time zone of the schedule.

advancedSchedule.description: Gets or sets the advanced schedule.

creationTime.description: Gets or sets the creation time.

lastModifiedTime.description: Gets or sets the last modified time.

weekDays.description: Days of the week that the job should execute on.

monthDays.description: Days of the month that the job should execute on. Must be between 1 and 31.

monthlyOccurrences.description: Occurrences of days within a month.

AdvancedSchedule.description: The properties of the create Advanced Schedule.

occurrence.description: Occurrence of the week within the month. Must be between 1 and 5

day.description: Day of the occurrence. Must be one of monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday.

AdvancedScheduleMonthlyOccurrence.description: The properties of the create advanced schedule monthly occurrence.

updateConfigurationNavigation.description: Software update configuration Run Navigation model.

name.description: Name of the software update configuration triggered the software update configuration run

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the resource.

properties.description: Gets or sets the id of the job stream.

jobStreamId.description: Gets or sets the id of the job stream.

time.description: Gets or sets the creation time of the job.

streamType.description: Gets or sets the stream type.

streamText.description: Gets or sets the stream text.

value.description: Gets or sets the values of the job stream.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link.

JobStreamListResult.description: The response model for the list job stream operation.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the Dsc configuration.

DscConfigurationAssociationProperty.description: The Dsc configuration property associated with the entity.

type.description: Gets or sets the content source type.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the content. This is based on the content source type.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the content.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the activity parameter.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the activity parameter.

isMandatory.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates true if the parameter is required. If the value is false, the parameter is optional.

isDynamic.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates true if the parameter is dynamic.

position.description: Gets or sets the position of the activity parameter.

valueFromPipeline.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates true if the parameter can take values from the incoming pipeline objects. This setting is used if the cmdlet must access the complete input object. false indicates that the parameter cannot take values from the complete input object.

valueFromPipelineByPropertyName.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates true if the parameter can be filled from a property of the incoming pipeline object that has the same name as this parameter. false indicates that the parameter cannot be filled from the incoming pipeline object property with the same name.

valueFromRemainingArguments.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates true if the cmdlet parameter accepts all the remaining command-line arguments that are associated with this parameter in the form of an array. false if the cmdlet parameter does not accept all the remaining argument values.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the activity parameter.

validationSet.description: Gets or sets the validation set of activity parameter.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the activity parameter set.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the activity parameter set.

ActivityParameterSet.description: Definition of the activity parameter set.

memberValue.description: Gets or sets the name of the activity parameter validation set member.

ActivityParameterValidationSet.description: Definition of the activity parameter validation set.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the activity output type.

parameterSets.description: Gets or sets the parameter sets of the activity.

outputTypes.description: Gets or sets the output types of the activity.

lastModifiedTime.description: Gets or sets the last modified time.

value.description: Gets or sets a list of activities.

message.description: Gets or sets the error message.
